explanations.machine learning: The paper proposes a CNN-LSTM neural network for predicting gold prices, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.supervised learning: The study involves training a model to predict gold prices based on labeled data, which is a supervised learning task.
explanations.regression: The paper focuses on predicting gold prices, which is a regression problem as it involves predicting continuous values.
explanations.support vector machine: The proposed model is evaluated against SVR (Support Vector Regression), which is a variant of SVM.
explanations.SVM: The paper mentions SVR (Support Vector Regression), which is related to SVM.
explanations.neural network: The study proposes a CNN-LSTM neural network for prediction.
explanations.deep learning: The CNN-LSTM model is a deep learning architecture.
explanations.representation learning: The CNN-LSTM model extracts potential features from sample data, which is a form of representation learning.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The proposed model includes a CNN component for feature extraction.
explanations.CNN: The paper explicitly mentions CNN as part of the proposed model.
explanations.recurrent neural network: The LSTM component of the model is a type of recurrent neural network.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper explicitly mentions LSTM as part of the proposed model.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly mentions LSTM as part of the proposed model.
